description: Detects when an attacker tries to backdoor the MSSQL server by adding a backdoor account to the sysadmin fixed server role
name: MSSQL Add Account To Sysadmin Role
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND Provider_Name:"MSSQLSERVER" AND winlog.event_id:"33205" AND Data:*object_name\:sysadmin* AND Data:*statement\:alter\ server\ role\ \[sysadmin\]\ add\ member\ *)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
